UI_visible_response: Yes, China's economy has been experiencing a slowdown recently. In 2024, the GDP growth rate declined to 4.8 percent year-on-year2. Additionally, it was reported that the Chinese economy expanded by only 4.6% year-over-year in Q3 of 2024, marking the slowest annual growth rate5. This trend indicates that China's economy is facing challenges and is projected to continue slowing down in the foreseeable future1.
traffic_visible_response: Yes, China's economy has been experiencing a slowdown recently. In 2024, the GDP growth rate declined to 4.8 percent year-on-year [[2]]. Additionally, it was reported that the Chinese economy expanded by only 4.6% year-over-year in Q3 of 2024, marking the slowest annual growth rate [[5]]. This trend indicates that China's economy is facing challenges and is projected to continue slowing down in the foreseeable future [[1]].
